pkgmetadata.longdescription: # vs-rgtoolsWrapper for RGVS, RGSF, and various other functions#### Dependencies- [vstools](https://github.com/Irrational-Encoding-Wizardry/vstools/)- [RGVS](https://github.com/vapoursynth/vs-removegrain)- [RGSF](https://github.com/IFeelBloated/RGSF)- [Akarin Expr](https://github.com/AkarinVS/vapoursynth-plugin)
